metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1734 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the pipe lookup plugin of ansible. Arbitrary commandscan be run, when the pipe lookup plugin uses subprocess.Popen() withshell=True, by overwriting ansible facts and the variable is not escaped byquote plugin. An attacker could take advantage and run arbitrary commandsby overwriting the ansible facts.

criterions.comment: ansible package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
